title: Plate, "Wooden Church", 1919
markings: Marks: On backside: hammer, sickle, cog, 1919, unidentified painter's mark hand- painted in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular plate with wooden church painted in center (tall conical dome), wide green border edged by thin black lines

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Wooden Church", 1919.
1919. porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-2.
